title: How it feels when you support for a good ADC

replies.body:
Playing ADC with bad support:

http://media.giphy.com/media/alVQ8O3XnTwqs/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=The Lexer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f8cNLEyK,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-06-17T19:23:28.048+0000)
>
> Playing ADC with bad support:
> 
> http://media.giphy.com/media/alVQ8O3XnTwqs/giphy.gif

Looks like someone is laning against a Kalista..!

> [{quoted}](name=Kryogen,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f8cNLEyK,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2015-06-17T20:10:16.336+0000)
>
> Looks like someone is laning against a Kalista..!

The OP made me remember when i supported a kalista as {{champion:16}} ... Must have been tough on the opponents !

> [{quoted}](name=The Lexer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f8cNLEyK,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-06-17T19:23:28.048+0000)
>
> Playing ADC with bad support:
> 
> http://media.giphy.com/media/alVQ8O3XnTwqs/giphy.gif

I see your opponent is kalista, you should always bring a good lock down support or a good poke/sustain support when facing a kalista.
{{champion:44}} because spirits of vengeance are dazzled by shiny things :)

ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL...righty then!  (Love those movies!)

I wonder how it feels when you also manage to feed the support as well?
As a person who plays ADC a lot, it feels freaking great because that means lane control is all ours and I'm completely safe. I feel like someone being protected by the Secret Service.
Like a poro to {{champion:201}}

Haha, awesome.

"With our powers combined... I am... Winning bot lane!"

Ace Ventura...

Oh man I haven't seen those movies in ages, but I can still hear his voice saying this line.

more like this

http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lmn9vg20kS1qc8pqd.gif

When your ADC steals your kills...
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Y96sOB_netY/Us55niB7NnI/AAAAAAAAVTo/8PsuEQRtvpI/s1600/fizz-nope.gif
lol. such pro

am I the only one irritated by all the laughing fish posts? 
No offence to laughing fish - has given me many a good giggles. But god damn the useless Gif on the home page every single day is getting annoying.
http://99gifs.com/-img/5096ec7aafa96f73b700539a.gif
At least laughing fish's post are somewhat different unlike all the nerf Riven posts that say the same god damn thing

> [{quoted}](name=MacDthree,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f8cNLEyK,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-06-17T20:37:41.727+0000)
>
> am I the only one irritated by all the laughing fish posts? 
> No offence to laughing fish - has given me many a good giggles. But god damn the useless Gif on the home page every single day is getting annoying.

The home page has all of the post types available on it, so it's more of just for looking around randomly to see if something catches your eye. He posts in memes and games (which is perfectly fine) not anything else so if you were looking for another 'type' of post, can easily just use the buttons on the left to say "hey, I'm looking for a team- lets go to team recruitment" or maybe "I want to see what neat meme's the playerbase came up with today! Meme's and games".

Cant really down someone for posting in the right section about something they enjoy, that's just cold!
http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2015-03/2/0/enhanced/webdr14/anigif_enhanced-buzz-12466-1425273598-12.gif

While i value your defense of him - i'm not downing him at all.  
When i'm looking for his memes, i get a damn good chuckle usually.  
I'm entitled to my opinion just as much as you are, and i do have the right to state that i'm tired of seeing his name on the "hot" page every day. 
Sorry that my opinion somehow offended you personally? I guess?

My name should always be in the hot section.
http://images.rapgenius.com/bf110cd0c6de04d830bd578b4cf8b8dc.500x281x15.gif

Well, that GIF fits.......... LIKE A GLOVE!
http://gph.is/1b9P9MP
Honestly, Support could really be one of the most enjoyable roles when you have a nice ADC

Exactly. But the problem is that every time your lane fails, you take the blame. And every time your lane wins, the ADC gets the credit. That is why I always make sure to tell my supports when they did good.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f8cNLEyK,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-06-17T19:52:12.774+0000)
>
> Exactly. But the problem is that every time your lane fails, you take the blame. And every time your lane wins, the ADC gets the credit. That is why I always make sure to tell my supports when they did good.

Oddly enough it's been a long time since I took the blame as a support. Obviously the ADC will blame me, but there's such a stigma against them that nowadays teammates usually assume the ADC is to blame

It's like reverse role-ism I guess? :P Being an ADC main is like being a white cis-male in today's society lol

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f8cNLEyK,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-06-17T19:52:12.774+0000)
>
> Exactly. But the problem is that every time your lane fails, you take the blame. And every time your lane wins, the ADC gets the credit. That is why I always make sure to tell my supports when they did good.

Supports do carry the ADCs in lane, but that doesn't mean the ADC is free from being blamed like their piss poor positioning
I remember I matched with that one actually good Vayne player in a game. Got them their BotRK at 10 minutes. That was a fun game.
Was their name Erodorii?
Possibly? I forget if they're on my friends list, and if they are, they might have changed their name a few times lol
I feel like a proud parent when I feed my ADC. "Look at this adorable death machine... *sniffle* My son...*
Support main: is true

And then their jungler is ganking you. Your jungler comes to counter gank.
Your ADC: TRIPLE KILL
Our Jungller: IM HE- Oh.

This is the most true post i've seen in a long time.
{{champion:1}} Approved

Yo fish help me find a motherboard for that build.

had to replace my z87 sabertooth cause it just won't work with my i5 4690k haswell series CPU I guess.
http://pcpartpicker.com/user/ToryJJ/saved/#view=CPzRsY

I have a 1TB HDD and a 256GB SDD
Couldn't remember names off top of head for those so didnt add them

Whats a good motherboard for this?
Make a post for me since people like your gifs and shit fish.
thanks.

Either of these two should work, depending on whether you want Micro ATX or standard ATX

Micro:
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16813128718&nm_mc=AFC-C8Junction&cm_mmc=AFC-C8Junction-_-na-_-na-_-na&cm_sp=&AID=10446076&PID=3938566&SID=

Standard:
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16813131976&nm_mc=AFC-C8Junction&cm_mmc=AFC-C8Junction-_-na-_-na-_-na&cm_sp=&AID=10446076&PID=3938566&SID=

the z87 motherboards from asus aren't compatiable with haswell 4k series CPU's.
Can't use my cpu with that motherboard.
Why It was refunded.

And idk about micro boards, why would I want that size
I have a obisidan 650D case, its large,. more than roomy.

I might just save for a rampage board.

I apologize, I did not see you already have a z87. Older z87s need a bios update to work with that Cpu. Here is a site that should help.
http://www.asus.com/microsite/2014/MB/New_4th_gen_Intel_processor_compatibility/#models

Np, so which of these would you reccomend for my build?
Idk jack all about motherboards honestly.
If you could point me to a few and explain they why I'd appreciate it.
explain it like I'm basically a moron, havent put a computer together in 8 years so I'm completely out of sight out of mind.
Well if you already have a z87, I would try everything I could to make it work before buying a new one. If you update the bios, it *should* work with your cpu.

How it feels when you support for a good ADC....

"This is what I have been training for.... The time to prove myself has come!!"
A good support can get a bad adc fed... they do nothing with it late game...great post.
+1 for Jim Carrey
